<$list filter="[list]"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/show-link" field=text/>
\end <$list filter=<> >
<>
<$list filter="[subfilter]-[]" >
<$macrocall $name=favslider title=<> content=<> />
" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/history": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/history", "created": "20200326073607951", "modified": "20200326080816159", "tags": "", "type": correct caption when caption filed has wikitext * ''4.0.0 '' -- 2019.12.17 -- a rewrite of old favorite plugin * ''3.0.12'' -- 2018.11.01 -- released by Mohammad Rahmani * ''3.0.5 '' -- 2017.08.03 -- released by Andrew Harrison" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/image": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/image", "created": "20181010141333403", "modified": "20200326185558195", "path": 55.5-76.1zm-57,67.9c-39.6-16.4-53.3-45-49.2-66.3 2.4-12.7 11.2-21 22.3-21 7.5,0 15.9,3.6 24.3,10.5 1.5,1.2 3.6,1.2 5.1,0 8.4-6.7 16.7-10.2 24.2-10.2 11.1,0 19.8,8.1 22.3,20.7 4.1,21.1-9.5,49.6-49,66.3z", "tags": "$:/tags/Image", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define favorites-svg() \end <$vars m='121.6,40.1' path={{!!path}}> <> " }, "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "Caption/Remove" }, "$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint/Add": { "title": "$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint/Add", "created": "20191216200037919", "modified": "20200326193116928", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "Add to favorites" }, "$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint/Remove": { "title": "$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint/Remove", "created": IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. <<< " }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/combo-search": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/combo-search", "created": "20191219070911471", "description": "do not delete, part of example 103", "modified": "20200326190600963", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define standardSearch() [listsearch] \define filterSearch() [list]+[subfilter] \define displayResult(filter) <$list filter="[]" variable=folder> <$view tiddler=<> field=caption/>
<$list filter=<<__filter__>> variable=item > <$list filter="[search:list]"> <$link to=<>/>
<$list filter="[subfilter]-[]" variable=folder> <$view tiddler=<> field=caption/>
<$list filter=<<__filter__>> variable=item > <$list filter="[search:list]"> <$link to=<>/>
\end \define combo-search(stateTiddler:"") <$vars pattern="^\[" stateTid={{{ [[$:/temp/combosearch/]addsuffix[$stateTiddler$]addsuffix] }}}>
<$edit-text tiddler=<> tag=input default="" placeholder="search by keyword or filter" class="sltext"/> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="text" $value=""/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$set name=searchTerms tiddler=<> field=text> <$list filter="[trim[]minlength[3]limit[1]]" emptyMessage="Search text too short" variable=ignore>
<$list filter="[regexpthen[filterSearch]else[standardSearch]]" variable=searchMethod > <$reveal type=nomatch default="filterSearch" text=<> > <$macrocall $name=displayResult filter=<> /> <$reveal type=match default="filterSearch" text=<> > <$macrocall $name=displayResult filter=<> />
\end" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition", "created": "20191223204533023", "modified": "20200326190417057", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define folderpath() $:/favorites/folder \define favlistTid() $:/favorites/favlist \define foldertagTid() $:/tags/Favorites/Folder \define folders() [tag[$(foldertagTid)$]] \define recentlyAdded() $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/recent \define temppath() $:/temp/favorites \define selectionTid() $(temppath)$/selection \define tempNewTid() $(temppath)$/new-folder \define temppopupTid() $(temppath)$/delete-confirm \define tempreorderTid() $(temppath)$/reorder \define saveTid() $(temppath)$/savetitle" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/folding-editor": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/folding-editor", "created": "20191222134036727", "modified": "20200326083226990", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define fv-folding-editor(tiddler) <$set name="state" value={{{ [[$:/temp/folding-editor/]addsuffixaddsuffix<__tiddler__>] }}}> <$reveal stateTitle=<> type="nomatch" text="edit"> <$transclude tiddler=<<__tiddler__>> field="caption"/> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" setTitle=<> setTo="edit">{{$:/core/images/edit-button}} <$reveal stateTitle=<> type="match" text="edit"> <$edit-text class="" tiddler=<<__tiddler__>> field="caption" tag="input" default="" placeholder="enter a folder title"/> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" setTitle=<> setTo="">{{$:/core/images/done-button}} <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="-[list<__tiddler__>]" /> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="-[[$tiddler$]]" /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<__tiddler__>>/> <$radio tiddler=<> field=text value=<<__tiddler__>>/> \end " }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/sidebar": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/sidebar", "caption": "Favorites", "created": "20191226064633412", "list-before": "$:/core/ui/SideBar/Recent", "modified": "20200326190524020", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\whitespace trim \import $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/slider \import $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition \define drop-actions() <$reveal type=match default=<> text={{{[listed[]match]}}} > <$vars oldFolder={{{ [listed[]]+[subfilter]-[]+[limit[1]] }}}> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="-[]" /> <$reveal type=nomatch default=<> text={{{[listed[]match]}}} > <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field='list' $subfilter="[]"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]"/> \end \define placeholder()
 
\end \define droppable-item() \whitespace trim <$droppable actions=<>> <>
<$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/delete-item" field=text/> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/show-link" field=text/>
\end \define droppable-item-after-last-item() \whitespace trim <$droppable actions=<>> <>
 
\end \define display-folder-is-empty()
<$droppable actions=<>> <> //Folder is empty//
\end \define display-fav-folder(folder) <$vars folder=<<__folder__>> > <$list filter="[listlimit[1]]" emptyMessage=<> variable=ignore>
<$list filter="[list]"> <$list filter="[contains]" variable=ignore> <$macrocall $name=droppable-item /> <>
\end \define display-fav-recentlyAdded() <$vars folder=<> > <$transclude tiddler=<> field="caption" /> <$list filter="[listlimit[1]]" emptyMessage=<> variable=ignore>
<$list filter="[list]"> <$list filter="[contains]" variable=ignore> <$macrocall $name=droppable-item /> <>
\end \define favorites-tree() <> <$list filter="[subfilter]-[]" variable=favfolder >
<$macrocall $name=favslider title=<> content="""<$macrocall $name="display-fav-folder" folder=<> />""" />
\end <>" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/slider": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/slider", "created": "20191220123602267", "modified": "20200326190213819", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define favslider(title, content) <$set name="revealState" filter={{{ [[$:/temp/favorits/]addsuffix<__title__>addsuffix] }}}> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" set=<> setTo="yes" > {{$:/core/images/right-arrow}} <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" set=<> setTo="no" > {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]" emptyMessage="""<$transclude tiddler=<<__title__>> field="caption"/>""" variable=ignore> <$macrocall $name="fv-folding-editor" tiddler=<<__title__>> /> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="yes"> $content$ \end" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/export": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/export", "caption": "Export", "created": "20191226173845382", "modified": "20200326083227031", "tags": "$:/favorites/Manager", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\import $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition \define lingo-base() $:/language/Search/ Export and delete favorites <$vars selection={{{ [get[text]] }}} >
<$select tiddler=<> class="sltext" field="text" default="message"> <$list filter=<> > <$list filter="[subfiltercount[]!match[0]]"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]prefix[$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/exptab]!has[draft.of]]"><$transclude/>
<$set name="resultCount" value="""<$count filter="[list]"/>""">
<> <$list filter="[list]" template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/>
" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/exptab-delete": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/exptab-delete", "created": "20191226172205238", "modified": "20200326190524040", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<$reveal type=nomatch default="0" text={{{[listcount[]]}}} > <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="delete tiddlers"> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="belowleft" animate="yes">
<$set name="resultCount" value="""<$count filter="[list]"/>"""> Are you sure you wish to delete permanently <> tiddler(s)?
<$button class="tc-button tt-button"> delete <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[list]" /> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field='list' $subfilter="-[list]"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field='list' $subfilter="-[list]"/>
" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/exptab-export": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/exptab-export", "created": "20191226172145394", "modified": "20200326190524050", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define export-favorites() <$reveal type=nomatch default="0" text={{{[listcount[]]}}} > <$macrocall $name="exportButton" exportFilter="[list[$(selection)$]]" lingoBase="$:/language/Buttons/ExportTiddlers/" baseFilename="favorites"/> \end <>" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/folders": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/folders", "caption": "Folders", "created": "20191226064442751", "modified": "20200326083227048", "tags": "$:/favorites/Manager", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\import $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition \define add() [[$(saveTitle)$]] \define newtitle() $(folderpath)$-{{{[tagcount[]add[1]addprefix[0000]split[]last[3]join[]]}}} \define new-fav-folder() <$edit-text tag=input tiddler=<> default="" placeholder="enter a folder name"/> <$list filter="[get[text]!is[blank]]"> <$vars folderName ={{{ [get[text]] }}} saveTitle={{{[get[text]]}}} > <$wikify name=xtitle text=<> > <$button tooltip="create new folder" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/new-button}} <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<> $savetitle=<> caption=<> tags=<> /> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="[get[text]]" /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=""/> \end \define folder-reorder(listTid) <$tiddler tiddler={{{ [get[text]] }}} > <$view field=caption/> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">down <$action-listops $tiddler="$listTid$" $field="list" $subfilter="+[move]"/>   <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">up <$action-listops $tiddler="$listTid$" $field="list" $subfilter="+[move:-1]"/>   <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">putfirst <$action-listops $tiddler="$listTid$" $field="list" $subfilter="[]+[putfirst[]]"/>   <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">putlast <$action-listops $tiddler="$listTid$" $field="list" $subfilter="+[putlast[]]"/>   <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">sort downwards <$action-listops $tiddler="$listTid$" $field="list" $subfilter="+[sort[caption]]"/>   <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">sort upwards <$action-listops $tiddler="$listTid$" $field="list" $subfilter="+[!sort[caption]]"/> \end \define remove-all-favs() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini" popup=<> > Remove all favorite items <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="belowleft" animate="yes">
<$set name="resultCount" value="""<$count filter="[list]"/>"""> Remove all <> favorite item(s)?
<$button class="tc-button tt-button"> delete <$list filter="[] [subfilter]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="list" $value=""/>
\end Create, rename, rearrange and delete folders !! Rearrange <<< Rearrange folder: <$macrocall $name="folder-reorder" listTid="$(foldertagTid)$" /> <<< !! Create <<<
<>
<<< !! Structure <<< <$vars fv-config-buttons=yes> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/sidebar" field=text/> <> <<<" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/search": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager/search", "caption": "Search", "created": "20191226092612349", "modified": "20200326083227054", "tags": "$:/favorites/Manager", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\import $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition \import $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/combo-search Search in favorites list (use filter or standard search) <>" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager", "created": "20191224190957179", "modified": "20200326083227025", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<>" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/readme", "created": "20200326073607952", "modified": "20200326082214810", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "; Favorites A favorite item also called a bookmark is a shortcut, you are creating for quick access to it. You can access that bookmark at any time and view that as many times as you want without having to search and find it again. ''Favorites plugin'' is a set of tool for creating favorites (bookmarks) in Tiddlywiki. Each favorite item is a shortcut to a tiddler. The Favorites plugin contains three modes * ''flat mode'': one favorite list, no folder * ''structured mode'': use folder, search tool, export and delete tool * ''frozen list'': read only, simple table of content style ;Code and demo For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages * Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Favorites/ * Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Favorites " }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/recent": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/recent", "caption": "Recently added", "created": "20200103090757281", "creator": "a revised version of Andrew Harrison favorite plugin", "list": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/styles/image.css", "modified": "20200326195945747", "modifier": "a revised version of Andrew Harrison favorite plugin", "tags": "$:/tags/Favorites/Folder", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/sidebar-tab": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/sidebar-tab", "caption": "Favorites", "created": "20191226064836102", "list-after": "$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open", "modified": "20200326083227061", "tags": "$:/tags/SideBar", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define show-options() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" to="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/manager"> {{$:/core/images/options-button}} Manager \end
---   <>
<$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/sidebar" field=text/>
" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/styles/image.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/styles/image.css", "button-color": "#ff0000", "created": "20200326140130064", "creator": "a revised version of Andrew Harrison favorite plugin", "modified": "20200326195938233", "modifier": "a revised version of Andrew Harrison favorite plugin", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": ".tc-tiddler-controls .notselected .tc-image-favorites-button { stroke: #ccc; fill: #ccc; } .tc-tiddler-controls .selected .tc-image-favorites-button { stroke: {{!!button-color}}; fill: {{!!button-color}}; } " }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/styles/style.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/styles/style.css", "text": ".sd-input textarea:focus, .sd-input input:focus { outline: none;} .sd-input textarea, .sd-input input { border:none; border-bottom: 1px dotted gray; margin-left:0px; width:75%;} .kk-custom-drop-down .tc-drop-down{min-width:60px;} .kk-favorites svg{ fill:#aaaaaa; } .kk-favorites button:hover svg { fill: #000000; } .kk-btn-mini svg { font-size: 0.7em; fill: #bbb; } /* in folding-editor*/ .fv-folding-button button svg{ font-size:0.8em; vertical-align: middle; } .fv-folding-button input[type="radio"] { width: 0.8em; !important; height: 0.8em; !important; vertical-align: middle !important; } /* form elements */ .fv-form label { display:inline-block; width:130px; margin-left:5px; } .fv-form input, .fv-form select { display:inline-block; width:320px;} ", "created": "20191219075310949", "modified": "20200326185700659", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "type": "text/css" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/delete-item": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/delete-item", "created": "20191220075034126", "modified": "20200326190524058", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<$button class="tc-btn-invisible kk-btn-mini" tooltip="remove item from favorites"> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="-[]"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="-[]"/>  " }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/item": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/item", "created": "20191226214526038", "modified": "20200326190524068", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define tooltip() contains $(cnt)$ items <$vars cnt={{{[listcount[]]}}}> <$link to="rr" tooltip=<> > <$view field=caption/> " }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/show-link": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/templates/show-link", "created": "20191220074823880", "modified": "20200326190524073", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<$link to={{!!title}} tooltip=<> > <$transclude field="caption"> <$view field="title" />
" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/add-remove": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/add-remove", "caption": "{{$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/image}}{{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption/Add}}", "created": "20181010141620348", "description": "{{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint/Add}}", "list-after": "$:/core/ui/Buttons/info", "modified": "20200326193035070", "tags": "$:/tags/ViewToolbar", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\whitespace trim \import $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition \define add-this-tiddler() [[$(currentTiddler)$]]+[putfirst[]] \define remove-this-tiddler() -[[$(currentTiddler)$]] \define show-favorites-button(class) <$list filter='[match[yes]]'> {{$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/image}} <$list filter='[match[yes]]'> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption/Add}}/> \end \define add-to-favorites-button() <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint/Add}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption/Add}} class=<>> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$macrocall $name="show-favorites-button" class="notselected"/> \end \define remove-from-favorites-button() <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint/Remove}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption/Remove}} class=<> > <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$action-listops $tiddler={{{[subfiltercontainslimit[1]]}}} $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$macrocall $name="show-favorites-button" class="selected"/> \end <$list filter="[listis[current]]"> <> <$list filter="[all[current]!list]"> <> " }, "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPanel/Settings": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPanel/Settings", "caption": "Favorites", "created": "20191229193717073", "list-after": "$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/TiddlyWiki", "modified": "20200326191059735", "tags": "$:/tags/ControlPanel/SettingsTab $:/tags/MoreSideBar", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define checked-frozen() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/sidebar-tab" tags=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/viewtoolbar" tags=""/> \end \define unchecked-frozen() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/sidebar-tab" tags="$:/tags/SideBar"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/viewtoolbar" tags="$:/tags/ViewToolbar"/> \end These settings let you customise the behaviour of Utility plugin. --- ;Show Utility setting in more sidebar :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPanel/Settings" tag="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> Show setting in more sidebar ;Options :<$checkbox checkactions=<> tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/frozen-list" tag="$:/tags/SideBar" checkactions=<> uncheckactions=<> > Enable frozen tab : Viewtoolbar icon color <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/styles/image.css" field="button-color" tag="input" type="color"/> :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/styles/image.css" field="button-color" checked="#ff0000" unchecked="#bbb"> Reset viewtoolbar icon color" } } }
